document_data.mainbody:
Roadrante Haltivur was a famous author in the 14 century DR.
Roadrante was famous (and infamous) for writing Tal Tessoran, an erotic adventure novel. After it was published she was inundated with offers to marry, ravish, redeem, or chastise her, depending on the readers opinions, and promptly went into hiding with a false name.
